original_title: UFC on Fox 1: Velasquez vs. Dos Santos
overview: UFC on Fox: Velasquez vs. Dos Santos was a mixed martial arts event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship on November 12, 2011 at the Honda Center in Anaheim, California. The event was the fifth that the UFC has hosted in Anaheim.
title: UFC on Fox 1: Velasquez vs. Dos Santos
